name.ca: Fons de pantalla de neu d'hivern
name.es: Fondo de pantalla de nieve de invierno
name.ko: 겨울 눈 배경 화면 새 탭

short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Winter Snow wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Winter Snow background. Winter Snow wallpaper background theme for fans.
short.ca: Winter Snow canvia la pestanya nova amb el fons de pantalla Winter Snow HD. Temes per als aficionats a la neu hivernal.
short.de: Winterschnee ändert neue Registerkarte mit Danganronpa Hintergrundbild. Themen für Winterschnee-Fans.
short.es: La extensión Winter Snow cambia una nueva pestaña con el fondo de pantalla Winter Snow HD. Temas para los fanáticos de Winter Snow.
short.fr: L'extension Neige de l'hiver change de nouvel onglet avec le fond d'écran Winter Snow HD. Thèmes pour les fans de Neige de l'hiver.
short.it: Neve invernale cambia la nuova pagina della scheda con lo sfondo dello sfondo Neve invernale. Temi per i fan di Neve invernale.
short.ja: 冬の雪は、冬の雪の壁紙の背景で新しいタブページを変更します。冬の雪ファンのためのテーマ。
short.ko: 겨울 눈는 새 탭 페이지를 겨울 눈 데스크탑 배경으로 변경합니다. 겨울 눈 팬을위한 테마입니다.
short.zh_CN: 冬天雪壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为冬天的雪的背景壁纸。冬天的雪粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 冬天雪壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為冬天雪的背景壁紙。冬天雪粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
This extension features some of the great Winter Snow background to make you feel good on your Chrome browser.

Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Winter Snow wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Winter Snow background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Search bar using Google.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Winter Snow new tab.
long.ca,de,es,fr,it,ja,ko,zh_CN,zh_TW:
This extension features some of the great Winter Snow background to make you feel good on your Chrome browser.

Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Winter Snow wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Winter Snow background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Choose search bar using Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo in settings.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Winter Snow new tab.
